sys_script.name: Validation Errors on Case Record

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_564966c893230210d739b1dcebba1033
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1166825_erp_assi_erp_case</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Validation Errors on Case Record</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
    try {
        // Ensure the current record has just been created
        if (!current.isNewRecord()) {
            return;
        }

        // Get the import set number from the case record
        var importSetNumber = current.import_set;

        // Wait for the transform to complete before querying the import set run logs
        var erpImportSetProcessor = new global.ERPImportSetProcessor();
        erpImportSetProcessor.waitForTransformCompletion(importSetNumber);

        // Update the case with the import set run logs and statistics
        erpImportSetProcessor.updateCaseWithImportSetRunLogs(importSetNumber, current.sys_id);

    } catch (e) {
        gs.error('Error in Update Import Set Run Logs in Journal Business Rule: ' + e.message);
    }
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-17 16:28:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>564966c893230210d739b1dcebba1033</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validation Errors on Case Record</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ERP ASSIST" source="x_1166825_erp_assi">cf7d84d797324a50e3e737d3f153af4b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ERP ASSIST">cf7d84d797324a50e3e737d3f153af4b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_564966c893230210d739b1dcebba1033</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-17 16:42:56</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=564966c893230210d739b1dcebba1033"/></record_update>
